name: Super Swing Prison
description:
LMB - throw your ball on chain as a projectile
RMB - toggles "spin mode"
WASD - movement

TIPS: use your spin mode to spin in a circle then time it and throw the ball at a guard. This will result in knocking the guard back super far and temporarily staggering him. 

This is my submission to the GDKO round 1 game jam

My character is a prisoner and his only goal is to use his trusty ball and chain attached to his ankle to keep the guards away.
